data.description: Fetch the information from Google Video
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The google video now is on a beta stage, and I register to this
    namespace because it can help programmer design a program to fetch
    the Video title, time length,etc.. and the important link that is
    Google Video FLV file link, the Video Original Link on server, it is
    a decoding function by Regular Expression...thx
